title: 2M Reports on HackerOne Celebration! - Ability to bulk-submit many reports.

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

summaries.content:
The researcher was able to bulk submit many reports by creating a lot of them in Draft mode and them submitting them simultaneously,

As result, we've limited the maximum number of drafts you can have to 500.

user.name: zerotea
user.bio: Hacker, Board Games enthousiast, mostly human and definitely not a robot. Software Engineer at HackerOne. They/them
